article_title: Hyundai Sonata Is Unveiled With New Design
article_text:
SEOUL—Hyundai Motor Co. previewed its new flagship Sonata sedan, hoping the model can reprise the gains in sales and image achieved with the car's current incarnation five years ago.

The revamped Sonata, which will compete against Toyota Motor Corp.'s Camry and Ford Motor Co.'s Fusion, has a more conservative design than its predecessor and is...
